title: Clueless at Twenty-Five, an Interview with Costume Designer Mona May
itunes:title: Clueless at Twenty-Five, an Interview with Costume Designer Mona May
description:
In honor of the twenty-fifth anniversary of the iconic fashion flick Clueless, we bring you a special interview with the film's costume designer Mona May.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
